# HR Team Pull Request

## Description
Please include a summary of the changes and the related issue or requirement.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Configuration change
- [ ] Documentation update

## HR Impact Area
- [ ] Employee data management
- [ ] Payroll processing
- [ ] Benefits administration
- [ ] Recruitment/Onboarding
- [ ] Performance management
- [ ] Time and attendance
- [ ] Training and development
- [ ] Other: _____________

## Testing
- [ ] Unit tests have been added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests have been added/updated
- [ ] Manual testing has been completed
- [ ] Test data uses anonymized/synthetic employee information

## Privacy & Compliance
- [ ] Changes comply with data privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA, etc.)
- [ ] PII (Personally Identifiable Information) is properly protected
- [ ] Access controls have been reviewed and updated
- [ ] Data retention policies are followed
- [ ] Changes comply with employment laws

## Security
- [ ] Sensitive employee data is encrypted
- [ ] Authentication and authorization have been tested
- [ ] Audit logging is in place for sensitive operations

## Documentation
- [ ] Code comments have been added/updated
- [ ] HR process documentation has been updated
- [ ] User guides have been updated
- [ ] Training materials have been updated (if applicable)

## Stakeholder Review
- [ ] HR team lead has reviewed
- [ ] Legal/Compliance team has been consulted (if applicable)
- [ ] Affected departments have been notified

## Additional Notes
Add any additional context, screenshots, or information that reviewers should know.
